Question
========

The following logistic regression equation shows the relationship between age in months (*X*) and the probability that a baby can walk loose (*Y*): $P(Y = 1) = \frac{e^{-15+1*X}}{1+e^{-15+1*X}}$. Calculate the probability that a baby can walk loose when he/she is 14 months old. 
Answerlist
----------
* 0.27
* 0.37
* 0.63
* 0.73

* Incorrect
